content.description: Abby and Jordan are doing a presentation for their AP Psychology class about the role oxytocin plays in the body.
content.question: Which of the following statements would be best to include in their description of oxytocin?

choices.label: It regulates appetite by signaling fullness and by helping to control food intake.
It increases mental alertness, concentration, and focus.
It promotes parent and infant bonding.
It influences the sleep/wake cycle by managing the bodyâ€™s internal clock.

content.answer: It promotes parent and infant bonding.
